content: @Lloyd McKenzie I don't understand the sourceELement part of this task. what element id? Doesn't this need to be a reference to an element definition? (Same as Questionnaire.item.definition...)
so error in this task... operation definition is normative. I have marked this elenment trial use
It's pointing to another parameter within the Parameters. No need to refer to a StructureDefinition because that's fixed. It's just a relative path.
